description:
In this course you will learn how to create a great business model for your business.

In the course I take you through my simplified 3-tier business model to help you get comfortable in how you think and create a strategy around your business model.

Once you are more comfortable business modeling, I walk you through the standard business model canvas. As I walk you through the standard business model canvas, I do my best to give you practical tips and examples for how to apply the elements of the business model canvas to your business.

After I walk you through the business model canvas, I go over some of the common business models out there that are effectively used by common businesses.

This way I do my best to get you multiple theoretical examples, multiple practical examples.

At the end of the course you will be able to create a better business model and strategy for your business.
title: Business model generation & modeling: business model canvas
